title: Decrease in price doesn't shift demand

content.question: All of the following cause a rightward shift in the demand schedule for a normal good EXCEPT

choices.label: a decrease in the price of the good
a decrease in the price of a complementary good
an increase in the price of a substitute good
an increase in consumers’ preference for the good

content.answer: a decrease in the price of the good

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
